titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require that qualified cash or deferred arrangements allow certain long-term employees to participate.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require that qualified cash or deferred arrangements allow certain long-term employees to participate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends provisions of the Internal Revenue Code relating to tax-preferred pension plans and arrangements to provide that qualified cash or deferred arrangements must allow long-term employees working more than 500 but less than 1,000 hours per year to participate in such arrangements.
